courses.name: Adobe Photoshop Masterclass
courses.long_description: This comprehensive Photoshop course covers everything from basic tools to advanced techniques. You'll learn professional photo editing, digital painting, compositing, and graphic design workflows. The course includes hands-on projects like creating social media graphics, photo manipulations, and digital artwork. We'll cover layers, masks, adjustment layers, smart objects, filters, and advanced selection techniques. By the end, you'll be able to retouch photos professionally, create stunning visual effects, and design marketing materials.
courses.overview: Master Adobe Photoshop from beginner to professional level with practical projects and real-world techniques.

student_reviews.name: David Kim
student_reviews.review: This course transformed my Photoshop skills completely. The projects were challenging but extremely rewarding. Lisa's teaching style is clear and engaging.

student_reviews.name: Sarah Johnson
student_reviews.review: I came in knowing nothing about Photoshop and now I can create professional designs. The support sessions were especially helpful when I got stuck.

courses.name: After Effects Motion Graphics
courses.long_description: Master the art of motion graphics with this comprehensive After Effects course. You'll learn to create professional animations, title sequences, and visual effects from scratch. We'll cover keyframe animation, shape layers, text animation, 3D space, camera tracking, and advanced compositing techniques. The course includes real-world projects like creating broadcast graphics, social media animations, and explainer videos. You'll also learn efficient workflows, expressions, and how to integrate with other Adobe apps. By the end, you'll have a professional demo reel showcasing your motion graphics skills.
courses.overview: Professional motion graphics training covering animation principles, visual effects, and industry-standard techniques in After Effects.

student_reviews.name: Alex Wong
student_reviews.review: Mark's expertise in motion graphics is incredible. The course projects helped me build a strong portfolio that landed me my first freelance gigs.

student_reviews.name: Sophia Martinez
student_reviews.review: The expressions module was challenging but so valuable. I now use them in all my projects to save time and create more complex animations.

courses.name: Illustrator for Graphic Design
courses.long_description: This Illustrator course teaches you to create professional vector graphics for logos, illustrations, and print materials. You'll master the pen tool, shape builder, typography tools, and advanced illustration techniques. The curriculum includes creating brand identities, packaging designs, and digital illustrations. We'll cover color theory, grid systems, and professional design principles used in the industry. You'll learn to prepare files for both print and digital media, with special attention to production requirements. The course includes real client projects and portfolio-building exercises.
courses.overview: Comprehensive training in Adobe Illustrator for creating vector graphics, logos, and professional design work.

student_reviews.name: Ryan Chen
student_reviews.review: David's approach to teaching design principles along with the technical skills was exactly what I needed. My design work has improved dramatically.

student_reviews.name: Nina Patel
student_reviews.review: The pattern creation and gradient mesh lessons were game-changers for my illustration work. Worth every penny!

courses.name: Premiere Pro Video Editing
courses.long_description: Master professional video editing with Adobe Premiere Pro in this hands-on course. You'll learn the complete editing workflow from importing footage to final export. The curriculum covers cutting techniques, audio editing, color correction, transitions, effects, and motion graphics integration. You'll work on real-world projects including short films, documentaries, social media content, and corporate videos. We'll also cover workflow optimization, keyboard shortcuts, and collaboration techniques used in professional editing studios. By the end, you'll have a polished demo reel showcasing your editing skills across different genres.
courses.overview: Professional video editing training covering all aspects of Premiere Pro workflow from basic cuts to advanced techniques.

student_reviews.name: Tyler Nguyen
student_reviews.review: Jessica's real-world experience shines through in her teaching. The documentary editing module helped me land my first industry job.

student_reviews.name: Priya Sharma
student_reviews.review: The color correction lessons completely transformed my work. I now understand how to make my videos look professional.

courses.name: Certified MERN Stack Development
courses.long_description: Become a full-stack developer by mastering the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js). This comprehensive course takes you from fundamental JavaScript concepts to building complete, production-ready applications. You'll learn to create RESTful APIs, implement authentication with JWT, work with databases, and deploy your applications. The course includes real-world projects like building an e-commerce platform and a social media app. By the end, you'll have a professional portfolio showcasing your full-stack capabilities.
courses.overview: Master full-stack JavaScript development with MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js through hands-on projects.

student_reviews.name: Michael Brown
student_reviews.review: This course completely transformed my career. The projects were challenging but gave me the confidence to apply for full-stack positions.

student_reviews.name: Emily Wilson
student_reviews.review: The JWT authentication module was worth the price alone. Clear explanations and practical implementation.

courses.name: Certified WordPress Development
courses.long_description: Go beyond basic WordPress usage and learn professional theme and plugin development. This course covers PHP fundamentals, custom theme creation, plugin development, and working with the WordPress REST API. You'll learn to create custom post types, taxonomies, metaboxes, and Gutenberg blocks. The curriculum includes security best practices, performance optimization, and e-commerce integration with WooCommerce. By the end, you'll be able to build custom WordPress solutions for clients or your own projects.
courses.overview: Professional WordPress development training covering theme customization, plugin development, and advanced techniques.

student_reviews.name: Daniel Kim
student_reviews.review: Rachel's deep knowledge of WordPress internals helped me understand how to extend WordPress properly. My development skills improved dramatically.

student_reviews.name: Sophia Chen
student_reviews.review: The Gutenberg block development module was exactly what I needed for my agency work. Clear, practical examples.

courses.name: Web Development with React
courses.long_description: Master modern frontend development with React in this comprehensive course. You'll learn to build interactive, component-based user interfaces using the latest React features including hooks, context API, and React Router. The curriculum covers state management, performance optimization, testing, and integrating with backend APIs. You'll work on real-world projects including a task management app, e-commerce frontend, and social media dashboard. The course also covers Next.js for server-side rendering and static site generation. By the end, you'll be able to build professional, production-ready React applications.
courses.overview: Comprehensive React training covering fundamentals, advanced patterns, and real-world application development.

student_reviews.name: Jason Park
student_reviews.review: Kevin's explanations of React hooks made complex concepts click for me. The course projects helped me land my first React job.

student_reviews.name: Olivia Martinez
student_reviews.review: The Next.js module was exactly what I needed to take my skills to the next level. Practical, production-focused content.

courses.name: Certified Python With Django
courses.long_description: Master web development with Python and Django in this comprehensive course. You'll learn to build secure, scalable web applications using Django's powerful framework. The curriculum covers Django's ORM, views, templates, forms, authentication, and REST APIs. You'll work on real-world projects including a blog platform, e-commerce site, and SaaS application. The course also covers deployment to production, performance optimization, and security best practices. By the end, you'll be able to build professional web applications from scratch and deploy them to cloud platforms.
courses.overview: Complete Django training covering web development fundamentals to advanced backend patterns with Python.

student_reviews.name: Daniel Lee
student_reviews.review: Robert's deep knowledge of Django internals helped me understand the framework at a fundamental level. The deployment module was particularly valuable.

student_reviews.name: Sophia Chen
student_reviews.review: The DRF section transformed how I build APIs. Clear explanations with practical examples that I could immediately apply at work.

courses.name: Certified Digital Marketing Specialist
courses.long_description: Become a certified digital marketing professional with this comprehensive course covering all essential aspects of modern digital marketing. You'll master SEO, social media marketing, PPC advertising, content marketing, email marketing, and analytics. The course includes hands-on projects with real-world tools like Google Ads, Facebook Ads Manager, Google Analytics, and SEMrush. Learn to create effective marketing strategies, run successful campaigns, and measure ROI. By the end, you'll have a professional portfolio showcasing your digital marketing skills and be prepared for industry-recognized certifications.
courses.overview: Master all aspects of digital marketing including SEO, social media, PPC, content marketing, and analytics through practical projects.

student_reviews.name: David Miller
student_reviews.review: This course transformed my approach to digital marketing. The hands-on projects with real tools gave me the confidence to manage campaigns for clients.

student_reviews.name: Priya Patel
student_reviews.review: The Google Ads and Analytics modules were incredibly detailed. I doubled my client's ROI using techniques learned in this course.

courses.name: Professional 3D Animation
courses.long_description: Master professional 3D animation techniques with this comprehensive course covering modeling, texturing, rigging, animation, and rendering. You'll learn industry-standard workflows using Autodesk Maya and Blender, creating character animations, motion graphics, and visual effects. The course includes 12 real-world projects ranging from simple object animations to complex character rigs and scene compositions. By the end, you'll have a professional demo reel showcasing your animation skills across different styles and techniques.
courses.overview: Comprehensive 3D animation training covering modeling, rigging, animation principles, and rendering for films and games.

student_reviews.name: Alex Wong
student_reviews.review: The rigging module was worth the price alone. Daniel's industry experience shines through in his teaching.

student_reviews.name: Emma Chen
student_reviews.review: I went from beginner to creating professional animations in just 4 weeks. The hands-on projects were incredibly valuable.

courses.name: Interior and Exterior Design
courses.long_description: Master architectural visualization with this professional course on interior and exterior design using 3ds Max, V-Ray, and SketchUp. Learn to create photorealistic renderings of residential and commercial spaces, including lighting setups, material creation, and post-production techniques. The course covers space planning, furniture modeling, landscape integration, and client presentation skills. You'll complete 8 real-world projects including luxury apartments, office spaces, and landscape designs, building a professional portfolio for architecture and real estate markets.
courses.overview: Professional training in architectural visualization for interior and exterior spaces using industry-standard tools.

student_reviews.name: David Park
student_reviews.review: Olivia's real-world experience in architectural visualization made all the difference. My renders now look professional enough for client presentations.

student_reviews.name: Sarah Wilson
student_reviews.review: The V-Ray lighting modules transformed my work. I can now create photorealistic daytime and nighttime renders with confidence.

courses.name: 3D Product Modeling
courses.long_description: Master professional product visualization with this specialized course in 3D product modeling and rendering. Learn to create high-quality 3D models of consumer products, electronics, packaging, and industrial designs using Blender and KeyShot. The curriculum covers hard-surface modeling techniques, material creation for different surfaces (metal, glass, plastic), studio lighting setups, and photorealistic rendering. You'll work on 10+ real product categories including appliances, cosmetics, and furniture, preparing you for careers in product design, e-commerce visualization, and advertising.
courses.overview: Specialized training in product modeling, materials, and rendering for e-commerce, advertising, and industrial design.

student_reviews.name: Jason Lee
student_reviews.review: The attention to detail in material creation was exceptional. My product renders now look indistinguishable from photography.

student_reviews.name: Nina Patel
student_reviews.review: As an e-commerce manager, this course helped me create professional product images in-house, saving thousands in photography costs.

courses.name: Professional Video Editing
courses.long_description: Master professional video editing with Adobe Premiere Pro and DaVinci Resolve in this comprehensive course. You'll learn the complete post-production workflow from organizing footage to final export, including advanced techniques like multi-cam editing, color grading, audio mixing, and motion graphics integration. The course covers editing for different formats - documentaries, commercials, social media, and narrative films. Through 8 real-world projects, you'll build a professional demo reel showcasing your skills in pacing, storytelling, and technical precision. By the end, you'll be prepared for freelance work or positions in production houses and media companies.
courses.overview: Comprehensive training in professional video editing techniques using industry-standard software.

student_reviews.name: Tyler Nguyen
student_reviews.review: Jessica's real-world experience shines through in her teaching. The documentary editing module helped me land my first industry job.

student_reviews.name: Priya Sharma
student_reviews.review: The color correction lessons completely transformed my work. I now understand how to make my videos look professional.

courses.name: Voiceover Masterclass
courses.long_description: Develop professional voiceover skills for commercials, animations, audiobooks, and corporate narration in this comprehensive masterclass. You'll learn vocal techniques, script interpretation, microphone skills, and home studio setup from industry professionals. The course covers various voiceover genres including character voices, documentary narration, and e-learning modules. Through practical exercises and real-world projects, you'll build a professional demo reel showcasing your range and versatility. Includes guidance on finding work in the voiceover industry and working with clients remotely.
courses.overview: Professional voice acting training covering techniques, equipment, and business aspects of voiceover work.

student_reviews.name: David Kim
student_reviews.review: Michael's guidance helped me land my first commercial voiceover gig within a month of completing the course. The demo reel feedback was invaluable.

student_reviews.name: Emma Chen
student_reviews.review: The character voice module was amazing! I discovered vocal ranges I didn't know I had. The animation project was particularly fun and challenging.

courses.name: Spoken English
courses.long_description: Master conversational English with this comprehensive spoken English course designed for non-native speakers. You'll develop fluency, pronunciation, and confidence through interactive exercises, role-plays, and real-life scenarios. The course covers essential grammar structures, common idioms, phrasal verbs, and everyday vocabulary. Learn to participate in conversations, give opinions, tell stories, and handle various social situations. With personalized feedback and accent reduction techniques, you'll improve your speaking skills for both casual and formal contexts. The course includes 50+ speaking practice activities and access to conversation partners.
courses.overview: Interactive course to develop fluency, pronunciation, and confidence in everyday English conversations.

student_reviews.name: Mohammed Ali
student_reviews.review: This course gave me the confidence to speak English at work. The practical exercises were exactly what I needed to overcome my fear of mistakes.

student_reviews.name: Yuki Tanaka
student_reviews.review: The accent reduction module helped me tremendously. My colleagues now understand me much better during meetings.

courses.name: Business English
courses.long_description: Develop professional English communication skills for the global workplace with this comprehensive Business English course. You'll master email writing, presentations, meetings, negotiations, and networking in English. The curriculum covers business vocabulary, formal writing styles, cross-cultural communication, and professional etiquette. Through case studies and simulations, you'll practice handling real business scenarios like sales pitches, customer service interactions, and job interviews. The course includes personalized feedback on your business writing and speaking, preparing you for success in international business environments.
courses.overview: Professional English communication training for emails, meetings, presentations, and workplace interactions.

student_reviews.name: Carlos Mendez
student_reviews.review: The negotiation module helped me secure a better contract with our international partners. The practical exercises were incredibly valuable.

student_reviews.name: Anna Petrov
student_reviews.review: My confidence in business meetings has improved dramatically. The course materials were relevant to my daily work challenges.

courses.name: Diploma in Graphics & Animation
courses.long_description: This comprehensive one-year diploma program covers all aspects of professional graphics design and animation. Students will master industry-standard tools including Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, After Effects, and Maya. The curriculum includes graphic design principles, 2D/3D animation, motion graphics, character design, and visual effects. Through hands-on projects, students will build a professional portfolio showcasing their skills in branding, advertising, and digital media. The program includes internship opportunities and culminates in a capstone project where students create a complete animated short film or design campaign.
courses.overview: Comprehensive training in graphics design, 2D/3D animation, and motion graphics for professional media production.

curriculum_weekly.title: Specialization Track
topics: Choose: Character Animation or Motion Graphics

student_reviews.name: David Kim
student_reviews.review: The comprehensive curriculum helped me land a job at a major animation studio. The internship opportunity was invaluable.

student_reviews.name: Sarah Johnson
student_reviews.review: The balance between theory and practical projects was perfect. My portfolio impressed several employers.

courses.name: Diploma in Full Stack Development
courses.long_description: This intensive one-year diploma prepares students for careers as full stack developers. Covering front-end (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React), back-end (Node.js, Python, Django), databases (MongoDB, PostgreSQL), and DevOps (Docker, AWS), the program provides hands-on experience building complete web applications. Students will develop 12+ projects including e-commerce platforms, social networks, and SaaS applications. The curriculum includes agile methodologies, testing, security, and performance optimization. The program culminates with a capstone project and guaranteed internship placement with tech partners.
courses.overview: Comprehensive training in both front-end and back-end development for building modern web applications.

curriculum_weekly.title: Specialization Track
topics: Choose: Frontend Mastery or Backend Systems

student_reviews.name: Michael Brown
student_reviews.review: The comprehensive curriculum helped me transition from a completely different field to a full-time developer position.

student_reviews.name: Emily Wilson
student_reviews.review: The capstone project was challenging but gave me the confidence to handle real-world development tasks.

courses.name: Diploma in Digital Marketing
courses.long_description: This intensive one-year diploma covers all aspects of modern digital marketing including SEO, PPC, social media marketing, content strategy, email marketing, analytics, and marketing automation. Students gain hands-on experience with tools like Google Ads, Facebook Ads Manager, Google Analytics, and HubSpot. The curriculum includes developing complete marketing campaigns, audience research, conversion optimization, and data-driven decision making. The program includes a 3-month internship and culminates with students launching and managing a live marketing campaign for real clients.
courses.overview: Comprehensive training in all digital marketing channels with practical campaign management experience.

curriculum_weekly.title: Specialization Track
topics: Choose: Performance Marketing or Content Strategy

student_reviews.name: David Miller
student_reviews.review: The internship placement helped me secure a full-time position before even completing the program.

student_reviews.name: Priya Patel
student_reviews.review: The hands-on campaign projects gave me practical experience that was invaluable for job interviews.

courses.name: IT Infrastructure & Cybersecurity
courses.long_description: This comprehensive one-year diploma prepares students for careers in IT infrastructure and cybersecurity. The program covers network administration, cloud computing, system security, ethical hacking, and digital forensics. Students gain hands-on experience with Windows/Linux servers, Cisco networking, AWS/Azure, SIEM tools, and penetration testing frameworks. The curriculum includes preparation for industry certifications like CCNA, CompTIA Security+, and AWS Certified Solutions Architect. The program includes a 3-month internship and culminates with a capstone security assessment project.
courses.overview: Professional training in network infrastructure, cloud technologies, and cybersecurity defense strategies.

curriculum_weekly.title: Specialization Track
topics: Choose: Network Security or Cloud Security

student_reviews.name: Jason Lee
student_reviews.review: The hands-on labs with real enterprise equipment prepared me perfectly for my current SOC analyst position.

student_reviews.name: Sophia Martinez
student_reviews.review: The certification preparation modules helped me pass my Security+ exam before graduation.

courses.name: Amazon Web Services
courses.long_description: Master Amazon Web Services (AWS) with this comprehensive cloud computing course. You'll gain hands-on experience with core AWS services including EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda, and VPC. The curriculum covers cloud architecture design, deployment, security, and cost optimization strategies. Learn to build scalable, fault-tolerant applications in the cloud while preparing for AWS certifications. Through real-world projects, you'll deploy web applications, set up databases, implement serverless architectures, and configure networking solutions. By course end, you'll be proficient in AWS services and ready for cloud engineering roles.
courses.overview: Comprehensive AWS training covering infrastructure, security, and application deployment in the cloud.

student_reviews.name: Michael Chen
student_reviews.review: The hands-on projects gave me the confidence to implement AWS solutions at work immediately after completing the course.

student_reviews.name: Emma Wilson
student_reviews.review: Excellent preparation for the AWS certification exams. The security module was particularly valuable.

courses.name: Blockchain Technology
courses.long_description: Master blockchain technology and its cloud applications in this comprehensive course. You'll learn the fundamentals of distributed ledger technology, smart contracts, and decentralized applications (DApps). The curriculum covers Ethereum, Hyperledger, and other major blockchain platforms with hands-on projects deploying solutions on cloud infrastructure. Learn to develop smart contracts using Solidity, create tokens, and build blockchain networks on AWS and Azure. The course includes cryptocurrency fundamentals, consensus algorithms, and real-world use cases across finance, supply chain, and identity management.
courses.overview: Comprehensive blockchain development training with cloud deployment strategies.

student_reviews.name: Daniel Kim
student_reviews.review: The cloud deployment modules transformed how I implement blockchain solutions for clients. Practical and immediately applicable.

student_reviews.name: Sophia Patel
student_reviews.review: Excellent balance between theory and hands-on development. The Solidity programming section was particularly well-structured.

courses.name: Cyber Security & Ethical Hacking
courses.long_description: This comprehensive cybersecurity course covers ethical hacking techniques, penetration testing, and network defense strategies. You'll learn to identify vulnerabilities, exploit systems ethically, and implement security measures. The curriculum includes hands-on training with tools like Kali Linux, Metasploit, Wireshark, and Burp Suite. Topics include network scanning, system hacking, web application security, social engineering, and cryptography. Through practical labs and real-world scenarios, you'll develop skills to protect organizations from cyber threats while preparing for industry certifications like CEH (Certified Ethical Hacker).
courses.overview: Professional training in ethical hacking, penetration testing, and cybersecurity defense strategies.

student_reviews.name: David Kim
student_reviews.review: The hands-on penetration testing labs were incredibly valuable. I was able to transition to a cybersecurity role immediately after completing this course.

student_reviews.name: Emma Wilson
student_reviews.review: Comprehensive coverage of both offensive and defensive security. The web application security module was particularly strong.

courses.name: IT Infrastructure & Cybersecurity
courses.long_description: This comprehensive one-year diploma prepares students for careers in IT infrastructure and cybersecurity. The program covers network administration, cloud computing, system security, ethical hacking, and digital forensics. Students gain hands-on experience with Windows/Linux servers, Cisco networking, AWS/Azure, SIEM tools, and penetration testing frameworks. The curriculum includes preparation for industry certifications like CCNA, CompTIA Security+, and AWS Certified Solutions Architect. The program includes a 3-month internship and culminates with a capstone security assessment project.
courses.overview: Professional training in network infrastructure, cloud technologies, and cybersecurity defense strategies.

curriculum_weekly.title: Specialization Track
topics: Choose: Network Security or Cloud Security

student_reviews.name: Jason Lee
student_reviews.review: The hands-on labs with real enterprise equipment prepared me perfectly for my current SOC analyst position.

student_reviews.name: Sophia Martinez
student_reviews.review: The certification preparation modules helped me pass my Security+ exam before graduation.

courses.name: CISCO CCNA
courses.long_description: Prepare for the Cisco Certified Network Associate (CCNA) certification with this comprehensive networking course. You'll master network fundamentals, IP connectivity, network access, IP services, security fundamentals, and automation. The curriculum includes hands-on labs with Cisco routers and switches, covering configuration, troubleshooting, and maintenance. Learn to implement VLANs, routing protocols, ACLs, and network address translation. The course prepares you for the latest CCNA exam while developing practical skills for network administration roles.
courses.overview: Complete training for Cisco CCNA certification with hands-on networking experience.

student_reviews.name: Alex Wong
student_reviews.review: The hands-on labs with real Cisco equipment were invaluable. I passed my CCNA exam on the first attempt thanks to this course.

student_reviews.name: Olivia Chen
student_reviews.review: Excellent preparation for both the certification and real-world networking tasks. The subnetting drills were particularly helpful.
